#### **Overview**  
This project focused on streamlining property operations to reduce turnaround time between guest stays. By analyzing workflows (e.g., cleaning, check-in, maintenance), I developed an optimized process plan using Excel and process mapping tools, achieving a 20% reduction in downtime.
